name: Change The Vote
description:
Develop a relationship with the personification of the American Electoral College and those of alternative voting systems in a casual contemporary chatroom!

Through this 20-minute experience,  you will gain substantial knowledge of the voting system the average American voter must interact with at least once every four years, as well as additional resources for how to help change it for the better.

This is still a bare-bones work in progress. Planned features for the future: 

Sounds!

Animations

Updated UI
